name: GrandeDRAMA Intense Thickening Mascara
about: What it is:An intense thickening mascara infused with omega fatty acid-rich castor oil to promote lush, dense-looking lashes with unbeatable shine and glossiness..Highlighted Ingredients:.Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens. This product is also vegan and cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:Say goodbye to thin, wimpy lashes. GrandeDRAMA's buildable, no-flake, vegan formula instantly lifts, lengthens, and adds volume to your lashes like never before. Plus, it's infused with castor oil, a tried-and-true favorite that is best known for its use as a DIY treatment for thick, healthy lashes..Clinical Results:In a consumer study on 32 subjects using GrandeDRAMA:
ingredients: Water/Aqua/Eau, Hydrogenated Olive Oil Stearyl Esters, Iron Oxides (CI 77499), Stearic Acid, Acrylates/Ethylhexyl Acrylate Copolymer, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower)Seed Wax/Helianthus Annuus Seed Cera, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Wax/Oryza Sativa Cera, Polybutene, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil), Polyglyceryl-3 Rice Branate, Propanediol, Glyceryl Stearate, C18-36 Acid Triglyceride, Polyvinyl Stearyl Ether, Aminomethyl Propanediol, Phenoxyethanol, HDI/Trimethylol Hexyllactone Crosspolymer, Methyl Methacrylate Crosspolymer, Ethylhexylglycerin, Laureth-21, Sodium Dehydroacetate.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Coat the applicator and sweep the hourglass brush from lash base to lash tips in an upward motion..-One or two coats should do the trick (our formula builds effortlessly in one or two sweeps)..-May be removed with makeup remover or soap and water.

reviews.review_text: This mascara was very disappointing. Application is deceiving. Goes on beautifully, but has the worst fall out of any mascara that I have tried to date. Formulation piles up in your under eye area and causes darkness.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried this amazing mascara from Sephora, and it has truly changed my life! From the first application, I noticed a significant difference in my lashes. They looked thicker, longer, and so much healthier. The formula is lightweight and doesn't clump, which is a huge plus for me. I love how it enhances my natural lashes without feeling heavy or weighed down. Plus, it lasts all day without flaking or smudging. If you're looking for a mascara that delivers on its promises, I highly recommend giving this one a try!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I loved the product for my lashes. It made my lashes super long without applying so many coats and it wasn’t sticky.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased this mascara instead of the lash serum as it was easier to manage! I oftentimes miss doing my lash care at night, but can’t go a day without mascara, so this product was perfect for thickening the lashes and lengthening them over time! The formula is similar to the Better than Sex mascara, but I like this better! I find that it is extremely volumizing as soon as you put it on. My favorite thing about it is you don’t even need to put multiple coats, so it’s perfect for when you’re getting ready quick in the morning! I also love the gold packaging, it makes me feel expensive. In my picture, you can see the before (left) and after (right). Get it if you can!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This mascara was alright, but for the price I wanted it to be great. Every time I applied this mascara it smudged terribly under my eyes. I have never had this issue with any other mascara, whether it was waterproof or not. Other than that the pigmentation and lengthening effects were nothing spectacular compared to other cheaper mascaras. Overall, I would not buy this product again. If you want to look like a raccoon within 30 minutes of application, feel free to give it a go. Otherwise I would stay clear of this junk-in-a-tube overpriced mascara.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

My tube dried out within 2 weeks of opening it! So disappointed! On top of that it didnt make my lashes look good! They always looked like I caked on 15 layers with how clumpy it was. After an hour it was flaked and falling off!! I WOULD NOT RECOMMEND!!

I love my thicker and fuller lashes. This lasts me through the whole day and rarely do I need to reapply. Love the brush and how big the tube is.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My eyes are sensitive, and I wanted to find mascara that doesn’t irritate my eyes. I like how it applies, eyelashes look full overall. It got flaky end of the day but still hold pretty good and my eye didn’t get red which is why I like it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Added lift and lots of volume to my lashes! A little bit of flaking, but it was minimal.   I purchase a lot of Grande Cosmetics products and none of them have disappointed so far. Definitely recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very large very thick tube. I like that it comes wrapped in plastic in a box to ensure sanitation. I have sensitive eyes and hate to think it could have been sampled before I use it. I’m only giving 4 stars because the size of the tube makes it a tad difficult to transport. Other than that no complaints up front

reviews.review_title: Turns my whispy blonde stubs into dramatic lashes!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have probably six tubes of mascara laying around because I just can't find a fav go-to brand. I can't say with 100% certainty this is it, but it's the closest yet! The pigment is deep and beautiful, the volume is noticable, but the only downside is that it does flake a bit. That's pretty common with more clean mascara brands though, so I've gotten used to it. Using a setting spray helps too. Overall, it does exactly what it says it will, and the addition of castor oil is absolutely ingenious!

This mascara was just ok. It did not wear well, it flaked and smudged only after about an hour of wear and it just didn’t look great after that. I do like the brush and upon application, my lashes did have some volume, but I think there are many other options at a lower price point that are a bit higher in quality and longevity.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my all time favorite mascara. I also used grande lash serum but I stopped using after I got this because the castor oil in the mascara does the same thing! I I swear my lashes are thicker and longer. It glides on and doesn’t dry up through out the day. 11/10

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love it!  I love it.  The castor oil in this makes the product luscious and no way it's dry and flaky.  The person who wrote the review must have gotten a bad tube or maybe she is nuts.  This glides on my lashes and doesn't clump and makes them fuller and longer looking just like in the promo.  I have tried every mascara from Too Faced Better than Sex to Giorgio Armani Eyes to Kill and it took castor oil in the tube to get the perfect product (for me anyway).  But seriously, I have tried every mascara Sephora offers over many years and this is what I need and in my opinion is THE BOMB!  I am a woman over 50 and clumped mascara on my lashes is not a good look at my age.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love! Love this mascara! I have tried almost every single brand and I didn’t have a favorite one until I stumbled upon this one. It’s not a waterproof mascara, but I love the look on my lashes. Sometimes I may combine it with another mascara to achieve a more dramatic look. I get complements on my lashes every time I’m wearing this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Okay, so it’s not the worst mascara I’ve used. I did not have any issues with dryness upon opening like some reviewers mentioned. I also had minimal flaking as I’ve had with others. I do like the thicker formula this mascara uses- it’s not watery, but more creamy. Overall, it was alright.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I had a mini of this that I threw out after one use. It was so dry and flaky and not easy to layer

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This mascara does what it says. It definitely makes my eyelashes look thicker but not longer. I bought this for the wand to cover all of them in one swoop and it does that, but it’s not like out of this world. I would hope at this point the formula didn’t flake! Haha I think it would have to have a super cheap formula in order to flake. I do like the fact that it has castor oil like it would help eventually make the eyelashes longer. Only time will tell!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It’s a decent mascara… wasn’t blown away but would use it again. Didn’t flake which was a plus, but if you apply more than 2x it gets clumpy. It did give my lashes a very full look which was great, and it held a nice curl after using my eyelash curler

reviews.review_title: A decent mascara, but nothing remarkable
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have pretty straight lashes that aren’t really anything to write home about. I typically use mascaras that provide volume, length, and curl, and I was actually impressed that this did help provide some lengthening and curl as well.   I’ve been struggling to find a mascara that stays on all day without flaking or smudging to my under eye area. This one stayed all day without any smudging or flaking, even on a 95°F day!   I don’t know if I can really speak to the “thickening” aspect that this is supposed to provide, as I didn’t really notice any effects from the castor oil.   The brush is okay, it’s not my favorite, but it works. So be aware though- I’m used to putting in multiple layers of mascara to get the effects I like, but I would not recommend applying more than a layer or two of this. It will get veeeery clumpy.   Overall, I think it’s a pretty good mascara that I am happy to continue using!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was intrigued to try this mascara for the hourglass shaped wand applicator - I feel like most of the brands I’ve tried either have a even thickness brush or the opposite where it’s thicker in the middle. I felt like I couldn’t get enough coating and thickening effects with one or two swipes as the instructions state, however it was a fine line to applying too much mascara and getting very spidery looking lashes. I haven’t used a mascara with castor oil ever either and didn’t find it to provide the shine and glossiness the description emphasizes. I think due to the shortness of my lashes I am better suited with a lengthening mascara which this doesn’t provide. The positives-It was easy to remove and lasted all day! I’d say just make sure it has the features you want before you splurge!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Works great on my lashes. It isn’t super chunky so it gives a nice more natural look. It also doesn’t flake !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Im absolutely in love with this mascara! My natural lashes aren’t very impressive and yet with this mascara, you would think they are, it really is dramatic. Even though it has castor oil, it isn’t heavy or weighs down the lashes at all! I would definitely continue to repurchase this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This mascara does what it’s suppose to do and that   is to thicken the lashes. The formula is just ok and I think the brush (wand) could be better. Overall it’s good for just thickening those lashes and not for the Length (just FYI to other reviewers who think it’s suppose to do both).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was nervous to try this mascara because my eyes can be really sensitive but it was not irritating at all. My lashes looked full and it didn’t flake.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was blessed with naturally dark, long and curved lashes but I am always looking to define and thicken my lashes. A lot of mascaras I have tried in the past, excel at lengthening for a dramatic effect but I haven’t had much luck finding a mascara that defines each individual lash without clumping and making my lashes look natural. Meet GrandeDrama! This mascara does exactly what I have been looking for all this time. At first I was worried a out the almost “messy” looking applicator but it is great for applying the mascara to my lashes. This mascara manages to coat and define each individual lash making my lashes appear thicker and darker. It also slightly adds length, but nothing to dramatic, for a natural look. Most importantly, the mascara does all of that without clumping!
Long, extended lash look. Doesn’t clump. I like the packaging too!

reviews.review_title: My mascara is fresh and creamy!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had tried this mascara at my friend house and loved it. I was quite shocked to read all negative reviews about it on Sephora. The product arrived not dried up in my case! It is quite creamy and moist if you will. I’m giving it 4/5 stars as I don’t find brush being very convenient. But as far as mascara it self - it’s great! Makes my eyes pop and doesn’t crumble a bit :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This mascara did lengthen my lashes and did add definition. I like that it has castor oil in it but I felt that it was a little on the heavy side for my lashes (they are lightweight). I would love a waterproof version of this because it would look much better for my light lashes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am always looking for a great black mascara this one gives long lashes

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The mascara does a great job making your eyelashes look thicker. Its hard to get it not to clump up though which is a downside for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I feel like the mascara does a good job in coating the lashes well and stays on as expected.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried a small size of this in a Birchbox and loved it so much I wanted the big version! I like how the brush and formula separates every lash and it doesn't clump at all. The conditioning formula is great for lash growth, too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love love love this mascara!!! Incredible texture and the volume add is fantastic

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Unlike other reviews, I really like the mascara's brush. It allows me to apply the mascara without too many clumps.  The one thing that I wasn't thrilled about was the formula. It's a bit thin, so I had to apply a few layers of mascara to get the effect I desired.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the packaging! It’s very sleek and classy. I also love how firm the applicator bristles are—it separates each lash, so there’s no clumping. My lashes look long, full and dramatic.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It leaves my lashes looking thicker and longer!  I went to the beach with it and it stayed in place the whole day!  Loved it  Definitely recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect everyday mascara! Definitely makes a positive difference on health of my eyelashes, the grow faster!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this mascara because it gives my lashes a natural volume.  I use it every day since they are light and do not irritate my eyes!  I love that it has castor oil as my lashes are a bit weak.

reviews.review_title: Won’t be without this mascara ever.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Wow. My new go-to mascara! I am really impressed with what this does to my lashes! I really wasn’t expecting such immediate and obvious results. But I got results the second I applied this. I quickly applied two coats to each eye and that was all that was needed. I have thin lashes and my eyes lack definition without help. And this dramatically awakens my eyes and makes them look fabulous! I didn’t have an issue with drying nor did I find a need to reapply after. My eyelashes were instantly darkened, thickened, and lengthened. The container it comes in is a nice thick and hearty tube. Looks sleek and good to hold. reviews.review_title: 40 years of looking, finally has results!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The bane of my makeup experience is mascara. I have blonde lashes (redhead) that tend to look more sparce & short with mascara than without. I've got deep set eyes which, as one gotten older, have given me a look as of my eyes are sunken in....  Since I started wearing mascara when I was 14-15 (I'm 59 now) mascara that help my eyelash game has been elusive. I've tried every drugstore brand imaginable for the past 44 years. I've tried premium brands and, seriously, for the money, there's 0 difference other than the money wasted to have a brand name. Actually, I've generally had superior luck with the drugstore brands.  This year, I joined the millions of others and joined subscription boxes (Ipsy & BoxyCharm). I've always loved makeup, they just feed that makeup obsession. It doesn't matter I'm older now, I still love makeup, but I wear far less now. Yes, I'm getting to the actual review, it needed back story though...  When I received this in one of my boxes, I thought, oh, great, another disappointing mascara. I saw where it contains castor oil, then I became curious. I started to apply and with each stroke of the brush, I literally saw a complete and shocking transformation of my eye lashes! They look like false lashes. Thick, not clumpy, long and with a sweeping curl not even the best of eyelash curlers could compete with! I'm ordering a new tube now and will continue to do so. I wish it had been a drugstore brand (so does my wallet), with these results...but, my 40+ journey to find a mascara I love has come to an end at last (at least until it stops providing these results. ❤️

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I’m sad that others haven’t had the great results I’ve had with this product! I’m actually not sure how I got it; it may have been in a subscription box, but I don’t usually go for intense volume mascaras. I am always, always on the hunt for lengthening mascaras, however. As such, just by name only, this was not on my radar. But, I had it lying around and figured I would try it before handing it off to a friend. Holy smokes! This is THE mascara I’ve been searching for! I’ve tried everything from Dior and Chantecaille to L’Oreal and Maybelline. Despite paying over $80 for some mascaras, my top choice before this was a $5 from Essence. This Grande one beats everything! As much volume as Diorshow, with the definition of Definicils, and the length of...I don’t know I’ve never had such great length! Now, I do use a lash primer with it, but I’ve had almost as good results without it. I prefer Marc Jacobs’s beige color primer (forgot the name). One swipe looks very natural, but definitely more volume and definition. Two coats, and it is the almost false lash look of my dreams! So so glad I gave this one a chance!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this in the monthly Sephora box. While I want to like it, I may have gotten a bad or old tube or something. The mascara just feels like really dry and very flaky. I’m not sure if that’s just how the formula is?? Doesn’t seem like it would be bad if it didn’t feel old

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: At first, I was skeptical, because it looked dried out. I wear it over fiber lash mascara and it really finishes things off.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am pretty impressed with this mascara.  I am sooo picky when it comes to mascaras and have probably tried everything. Length is the most important aspect for me but love it when they are full also, as a benefit.  Usually, I prefer plastic wands but this one surprised me as to how well I liked it.  This made my lashes long AND full.  I have hooded eyes as well and have a tendency to get mascara on my blended eye looks ( so frustrating) but I didn't have a problem with this one. Don't know why.  I recently tried the Thrive causemetics one everyone raves about for length and this one, In my opinion is much better.  Did not irritate me eyes either as I have sensitive eyes.  So thrilled to finally see some drama on my lashes!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Received this in my Play! this past month. Although it looks thick and clumpy on the wand, hardly anything shows up when applied to eyelashes. I tried to put a second coat on, and it still looked like I was wearing nothing. I threw it away.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m a huge mascara fanatic ( i have a drawer full) and i could not make this work for me! it has a super dry formula that i had a really tough time applying evenly, and i was shocked by how sheer it almost was. it almost seemed grey! i applied three layers and there was barely anything on my eyelashes. topped it off with one of my favorite mascaras and the difference was astounding! left side (my right) is the side i put another mascara on top of, right side (my left) is the mascara by itself

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this mascara! I use it almost every day. I love really bold lashes, so I'm always on the look out for the right product to add volume without looking clumpy. You can use it with our without a primer, but I think it looks great either way. I get a lot of questions/compliments about my lashes when I wear it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I religiously used YSL and Chanel mascaras for years, but this one is my absolute favorite. Creates so much thickness, length, and shine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I got a sample of this in my Dec ‘19 Play bag. I am disappointed and would never buy a full size of this product. It came to me dry, clumpy, and totally unusable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Awful! So clumpy on the wand, weird smell  and barely noticeable on lashes. I received this in my play box and threw it out after one use. Worst mascara I ever used!

This mascara was so disappointing. I don’t normally both to write reviews for products I don’t like but I felt compelled to write this one. It is clumpy and dry and does not go on easily. You would be better off wearing castor oil alone on your lashes, that’s how bad this one is. If you want a mascara that has oil in it I recommend the Sephora brand, it’s 1000 x better.
this stuff is INCREDIBLY dry, crusty and nasty. it's impossible to use. pretty much worst case scenario for a mascara. don't waste your money!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: just terrible! I've received it in my play!box, and it's totally dry, so it just goes to trash, no chance to use it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: got a sample from Play from Sephora. it was pretty dried out and also had to keep sticking back into the tube for more... could be the samples???

reviews.review_title: Did we all get expired mascaras here???
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Horrid.  Like many other reviewers here, I received this in my Play Box and it was COMPLETELY dried up before I even opened it.  I couldn't get any product onto my lashes at all. This is super annoying because I was really looking forward to trying it since I know first-hand that their serum works very well.  But now I am not going to spend $$ on this since pretty much everyone said it was all dried up and old. Not sure if Grande sent Sephora some expired products or if Sephora just kept them in the warehouse too long, but FAIL.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this in my Play box. I saw such mixed reviews so I had to try it right away. I see why the poor reviews. I have blonde eyelashes and after I tried putting this on, they were still blonde. This formula is so dry it won’t even apply. Like, really doesn’t apply. Maybe it was old? Whatever the case, I’ll stick with my IT Superhero.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received the trial size in my December n PlayBox I gave this three stars because the end result was decent. My eyelashes really do look fuller but the amount of time I had to use working the product through and separating my eyelashes while removing clumps just wasn’t worth it for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: when I opened it, NEW. The product looked old and flakey. Not for me. It would barely come off the wand.  :(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Got this in my Sephora Play! Box and this thing went straight to garbage. Clumpy and Dry! Very very Dry! As if this was an old dried out mascara.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got a sample in my play box and unfortunately it’s not what I expected :/. It was really dry and flakey. It seemed like it was old mascara. Not sure how an actual size tube will be but definitely wouldn’t want to risk buying it :/

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Received a sample. Horrible. Was left with raccoon eyes after 3 hours. Flakes terribly. Would not recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This was dry and did absolutely nothing for my lashes. Overpriced. Not a fan.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Very dry.  It's fine for a barely there look, but not intense nor thickening.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I literally cannot believe this mascara has any positive reviews. Like have you girls never used better than sex, bad gal bang or even monsieur???? Either way this formula is so dry. Literally so dry. It’s not dark black it literally does NOTHING for your lashes. Volume??? How is this a volume mascara?? I have tried nearly every mascara on the market as far as department store brands and I’m so glad I got this as a sample and didn’t purchase. I would have returned immediately.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I didn’t have any luck with this mascara. The product itself is very thick and was hard to apply without clumping. Even the brush had clumps forming on it and when I tried to pump it to smooth it out, it only got worse. The formula was very flaky when it dried. I do live in a dry environment. I am feeling a bit disappointed with this purchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I got the trial size in my Sephora Play box and this was the worst mascara they've ever sent. It was dried up in the tube and I could barely get any on my lashes and what did go on was clumpy. Had to use another brand's mascara on over top. The brush is also smaller than a normal mascara wand (which the brush looks to be the same size as what you'd get in the full size version). Would never purchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: what in the dried up heck is this?  i got a sample in my play box, thankfully, because i was considering buying it.  it is horrible.  i could barely get my lashes covered - i kept sticking it back in the tube trying to get more so i could get it spread over my lashes.  this is tragic.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Barely can tell you have it on, and when you can, it’s cause it’s smudged on your lower lid. No thickening action with the castor oil in general, and the mascara itself did not add volume as described.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the color but it’s impossible to remove but it transfers at the upper and lower eyelids. So messy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Clumpy, messy and really flaky. Dries out quickly, waste of time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really clumpy and uneven. It also flakes off easily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like the mascara and it works beautifully.  My only issue is the container has dried up very quickly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This mascara did not go on well. It doesn’t last at all and doesn’t have any structure to it. I had to put in a coat if another brand after I put this on. I really wanted to like it because the serum in it. It’s way too expensive for the quality. Really hated this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like the mascara it’s okay but I think there are better ones for the same price. You can buy castor oil separately to wear at nighttime and I think that’s the better option

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this mascara! Easy to apply and it instantly lengthens and thickens your lashes. I only use drug store mascaras and have never been impressed by expensive mascaras before...but I’ll change my tune for this one. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Make my lashes look longer and thicker. Highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Holy grail. Seriously, try it and you won’t be disappointed. It separates, lengthens, and volumizes without smudging. The brush is big, so it takes some practice to using it. I get best results if I focus most of the product at the lash root and then just brushing up. If you’re a fan of Too Faced Better Than Sex mascara but hate how it smudges, try this! It’s so much more.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Quite honestly the best mascara I’ve ever used, and I’ve used a lot of them. If you just have a little patience and work the brush right, your lashes will come out thick but not clumpy. I get my lashes lifted so this mascara is the perfect extra oomph. And with the castor oil, I’ve definitely noticed fuller and longer lashes. Never really comes off underneath my eyes, either, which is something I’ve never experienced in a non waterproof mascara. Overall, it’s a big win for me.

reviews.review_title: People Think My Lashes Are Fake!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased this mascara after having pretty good success with other Grande products (GrandeLash and GrandeBrow). I’ve been using this mascara daily and have noticed a significant difference in the strength and thickness of my lashes! The mascara itself works wonders while you wear it, it makes my lashes look full and long without fallout or caking. But I truly feel that this has also improved the health of my lashes by nourishing them while the mascara is on as opposed to hurting them. Not many other mascaras do that. People ask me constantly where I get my lashes done and are shocked when I tell them they are real! This mascara is the only one you should be using if you want big, full real lashes!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This mascara is awesome. I have been using it for a few months now and my lashes have become thicker, and have grown. It contains castor oil which works wonders on lashes.  No lash fallout, no spider lashes, just a beautiful fanned out look. I would reccomend this product to anyone that wants healthy thick  dramatic looking lashes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this mascara.  Easy to build and doesn’t clump. My new favorite mascara

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a decent mascara. It's neither terrible, nor amazing. Basically, I will use it till it's done and not repurchase. However, I have not been using it for long enough to see if any of it's touted ingredients help my lashes.  I will say though that the Grande primer helped my lashes when I used it daily. That's why I gave this a try. Unfortunately, I don't have time for eyelash primer every day and wanted to see if this did the trick. Will update my review if it does.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Disappointed in this mascara. I have used the older version of GrandeLash and liked it. So was anxious to try this. It does nothing for my lashes at all. I guess I am in the minority based on the great reviews. Going back to Hourglass Caution.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: One of the best mascaras for length and volume. I tried this for free from influenster and I think this is the best thing they’ve ever sent me. Seriously worth it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: this is really dry! like I feel as if I got a bad tube? there is hardly any color payoff. drugstore has to be better than this. will not repurchase

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gives good volume, but requires some work and is super dry. worried it may dry out quickly.

reviews.review_title: Still flaky after a few hours
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love the big bold lashes this product creates but seriously it leaves specks all over my eye area after only a few hours. I combined it with some mascara base from Lancome that I received in my Sephora Playbox and now it works fantastic.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Clumpy and flaky—I took a chance based on other reviews but was very disappointed.

reviews.review_title: Finally a mascara worth leaving the drug store for
reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Best mid range mascara I've ever purchased! I don't spend high $$$ on my makeup so if I can CVS it, I will! But THIS mascara DELIVERS! Long length, long wear, good separation, and washes right off. So if you need waterproof this is not for you. Just takes a couple of coats and my mid-life lash loss problems are resolved. I would have loved to have seen this product on my younger, thicker, fuller, longer lashes. (I'm 49. Age happens.) Dynamo! Great product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Grande mascara: I'd give this 10 stars if I could!! I haven't been able to find a clean, natural, vegan formulation to replace my Too Faced Better Than Sex mascara which is, ahem, was, my holy grail. This mascara is the BOMB. I do 2-3 coats NO MATTER the mascara and I normally curl my lashes. This doesn't transfer, it's buildable, it has length AND volume, it's DARK, and you can go for a va-va-voom look if you wish by doing several coats. The first few times wearing these people asked me if I had eye-lash extensions! I mean, it doesn't get better than that in my opinion. I'm going to post a more in-depth review on my blog linareviews.com so if you'd like to check it out please do, but honestly, I need to buy five of these-- it's SO GOOD!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This review is based off of my first use of this product. I’ve only used it once. I have somewhat short lashes and they are straight. For reference, I normally wear Lancôme definicles which defines and curls my lashes. The grande mascara made my lashes clump and did not define my lashes. Instead they stuck together and I got my fine point tweezers to separate them. I am going to try them again and hope for the best! Otherwise, it’s looking like I’ll have to return it. :(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love love love! I put it in at 7 am and it looked just as fresh at 7 pm. No flaking or smudging.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love love this mascara. I’ll definitely buy it again. This one is to stay forever. It separated my eyelashes perfectly and gave me longer lashes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love love love ! Best mascara ever and trust me I’ve tried them all . Black dramatic lashes with  no clumping !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Oh yes. This mascara is it! On first application it's not too wet, but has enough grip that it coats every lash. Its that perfect consistensy of a mascara that's initially too wet when first opened and then dries down a bit after a few weeks. I love it. My lashes are also pin straight and with this mascara they're holding a curl even before an eyelash curler. Can't speak to it's nourishing effects yet but so far I'm very impressed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This mascara is a DREAM! It does everything that it says it does with no clumping, no flaking. My lashes look so long, lush and dramatic. I have really oily skin, so I have a really hard time finding a good volumizing mascara that doesn’t leave me with raccoon eyes by mid-day, but this mascara works perfectly! It reminds me of Better Than Sex, but I find it doesn’t leave my lashes looking dry or flaky after a long day like BTS sometimes can...Maybe because of the castor oil GrandeDRAMA.  I use their lash serum every day and paired with this mascara, I couldn't imagine going back to falsies. It comes off super easy too with a balm-based makeup remover (Farmacy's Green Clean is my fav!).  If you want out of this world extreme lashes, use their GrandePRIMER with this and your lashes will be next level. I learned it works best if you apply mascara immediately after primer - don't let it dry, I do one eye at a time! I seriously could not recommend Grande Cosmetics' lash products enough.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I don't understand the reviews.  While this isn't a terrible mascara it's not amazing.  It does load ur lshed w a ton of heavy mascara that makes ur lashes stick if u layer.  Primer doesn't seem to help and it makes. My curly lashes less curly.  I love the serum just not this mascara

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I usually don’t write reviews, but I must admit, this mascara impressed me. I’m usually a Maxilash or Hypnose Custom girl, but this ranks up there with them and is actually nourishing. I will be ordering this again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this mascara! Awesome to layer and it easily combs through my lashes without looking clumpy. Another plus, my lashes actually look healthier now from switching to this mascara.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is the DRAMA I LOve !  I love this mascara!  I love the brush and the formula is amazing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: AMAZING volume with just one coat! I get complimented on my lashes 24/7, all thanks to Grande!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Beyond thick lashes with one stoke - DRAMA!!! I love that it has castor oil as well. My lashes are now beyond thick and now have DRAMA.
